mapper.sql: SELECT auth_rent_user.id , auth_rent_user.salesId, auth_rent_user.dealerId, auth_rent_user.clientKey, auth_rent_user.category, auth_rent_user.mac, auth_rent_user.firstName, auth_rent_user.lastName, auth_rent_user.email, auth_rent_user.phone, auth_rent_user.paymentType, auth_rent_user.cardNumber, auth_rent_user.expirationDate, auth_rent_user.securityKey, auth_rent_user.deposit, auth_rent_user.first_pay, auth_rent_user.month_pay, auth_rent_user.ld_commission, auth_rent_user.dealer_commission, auth_rent_user.sales_commission, auth_rent_user.createTime, auth_rent_user.activateTime, auth_rent_user.expiresTime, auth_rent_user.status, auth_rent_user.country, auth_rent_user.region, auth_rent_user.city, auth_rent_user.timeZone, auth_rent_user.lastOnLineTime, auth_sales.username salesName, auth_dealer.username dealerName FROM auth_rent_user JOIN auth_sales ON auth_rent_user.salesId = auth_sales.id JOIN auth_dealer ON auth_rent_user.dealerId = auth_dealer.id
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auth_rent_user WHERE mac=#{mac}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auth_rent_user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT status FROM auth_rent_user WHERE mac=#{mac}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_rent_user (salesId, dealerId, clientKey, category, mac, firstName, lastName, email, phone, paymentType, cardNumber, expirationDate, securityKey, deposit, first_pay, month_pay, ld_commission, dealer_commission, sales_commission ,activateTime, expiresTime, status) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{dealerId}, #{clientKey}, #{category}, #{mac}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{paymentType}, #{cardNumber}, #{expirationDate}, #{securityKey}, #{deposit}, #{firstPay}, #{monthPay}, #{ldCommission}, #{dealerCommission}, #{salesCommission}, #{activateTime}, #{expiresTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT s.salesId , COUNT(*) volume, auth_sales.username salesName FROM auth_rent_user AS s, auth_sales WHERE s.salesId = auth_sales.id AND status!='canceled' GROUP BY s.salesId ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT #{_parameter};

SELECT s.salesId , COUNT(*) volume, auth_sales.username salesName FROM auth_rent_user AS s, auth_sales WHERE s.salesId = auth_sales.id AND s.dealerId=#{id} AND status!='canceled' GROUP BY s.salesId ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT #{leaderId};
